//! {{ title }} - AuroraView Standalone Application with Embedded Python
//!
//! Generated by AuroraView Pack with PyOxidizer integration
//!
//! This executable includes:
//! - WebView for frontend rendering
//! - Embedded Python runtime for backend logic
//! - All assets bundled as resources

use std::error::Error;
use std::ffi::CString;
use std::path::PathBuf;
use std::thread;
use tao::{
    event::{Event, WindowEvent},
    event_loop::{ControlFlow, EventLoop},
    window::WindowBuilder,
};
use wry::{WebContext, WebViewBuilder};
use rust_embed::Embed;

// Embed frontend assets
#[derive(Embed)]
#[folder = "assets/"]
struct Asset;

// PyEmbed imports
use pyembed::{MainPythonInterpreter, OxidizedPythonInterpreterConfig};

const APP_NAME: &str = "{{ name }}";
const APP_TITLE: &str = "{{ title }}";
const APP_WIDTH: u32 = {{ width }};
const APP_HEIGHT: u32 = {{ height }};

/// Get the WebView data directory in the platform-specific app data location
fn get_data_dir() -> PathBuf {
    dirs::data_local_dir()
        .unwrap_or_else(|| std::env::current_dir().unwrap_or_default())
        .join(APP_NAME)
}

fn main() -> Result<(), Box<dyn Error>> {
    // Initialize Python interpreter in a background thread
    let _python_handle = thread::spawn(|| -> Result<(), Box<dyn Error + Send + Sync>> {
        let config = OxidizedPythonInterpreterConfig::default();
        let interp = MainPythonInterpreter::new(config)?;

        interp.with_gil(|py| {
            println!("[Python] Interpreter initialized: {}", py.version());
            {% if backend_entry -%}
            // Run backend entry point
            let code = CString::new("from {{ backend_module }} import {{ backend_func }}; {{ backend_func }}()")?;
            py.run(&std::ffi::CStr::from_bytes_with_nul(code.as_bytes_with_nul())?, None, None)?;
            {%- endif %}
            Ok::<(), Box<dyn Error + Send + Sync>>(())
        })?;

        Ok(())
    });

    // Create window and WebView
    let event_loop = EventLoop::new();
    let window = WindowBuilder::new()
        .with_title(APP_TITLE)
        .with_inner_size(tao::dpi::LogicalSize::new(APP_WIDTH, APP_HEIGHT))
        .build(&event_loop)?;

    // Create WebContext with app-specific data directory
    let data_dir = get_data_dir();
    std::fs::create_dir_all(&data_dir)?;
    let mut web_context = WebContext::new(Some(data_dir));

    // Load embedded index.html
    let index_html = Asset::get("index.html")
        .expect("index.html not found in embedded assets");
    let html_content = std::str::from_utf8(index_html.data.as_ref())?;

    let _webview = WebViewBuilder::new_with_web_context(&mut web_context)
        .with_html(html_content)
        .with_custom_protocol("asset".into(), |_webview_id, request| {
            let path = request.uri().path().trim_start_matches('/');
            match Asset::get(path) {
                Some(asset) => {
                    let mime = mime_guess::from_path(path)
                        .first_or_octet_stream()
                        .to_string();
                    wry::http::Response::builder()
                        .header("Content-Type", mime)
                        .body(asset.data.to_vec().into())
                        .unwrap()
                }
                None => wry::http::Response::builder()
                    .status(404)
                    .body(b"Not Found".to_vec().into())
                    .unwrap(),
            }
        })
        .build(&window)?;

    event_loop.run(move |event, _, control_flow| {
        *control_flow = ControlFlow::Wait;

        if let Event::WindowEvent {
            event: WindowEvent::CloseRequested,
            ..
        } = event
        {
            // Signal Python to shutdown gracefully
            *control_flow = ControlFlow::Exit;
        }
    });
}
